question:
What are the names of the superheroes with the power of death touch?
name of superheroes refers to refers to superhero_name; the power of death touch refers to power_name = 'Death Touch'
query: SELECT T1.superhero_name FROM superhero AS T1 INNER JOIN hero_power AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.hero_id INNER JOIN superpower AS T3 ON T2.power_id = T3.id WHERE T3.power_name = 'Death Touch'
